comments: (-1)^(n+1) = signed area of parallelogram with vertices (0,0), U=(F(n),F(n+1)), V=(F(n+1),F(n+2)), where F = A000045 (Fibonacci numbers). The area of every such parallelogram is 1. The signed area is -1 if and only if F(n+1)^2 > F(n)*F(n+2), or, equivalently, n is even, or, equivalently, the vector U is "above" V, indicating that U and V "cross" as n -> n+1. - _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 09 2013
